about_the_game:
See a whole new side of Past Mistakes, through wallpapers, cut content and a trusty pair of X-Ray Specs! Take a look under many characters’ clothes and outfits, revealing their full nude glory! See a whole host of wallpapers featuring Past Mistakes’ characters in varying states of undress, and indulge in what could have been with our cut content gallery!

  • Wallpapers in stunning 4K resolution, featuring characters from Past Mistakes in all sorts of outfits (or lack thereof)

  • X-Ray Specs, which allow you to see a range of alternate, naked CGs in Past Mistakes.

  • Cut content, featuring all sorts of stuff that didn’t make the release of the game in varying levels of completion.

How to access the DLC:

1. Hit the "Download" button.

2. If the game opens automatically, close it.

3. Restart Steam.

4. Find Past Mistakes in your Library and launch it.

content_descriptors.notes:
This add-on content works in conjunction with the free NSFW Patch DLC, by adding further images to the game in the form of “X-ray” versions of existing rendered images. Wallpapers also contain nude and lewd content. All characters in this game are adults aged 18 or over and all scenes and encounters are entirely consensual. Sexual and nude content is present from the outset. Sexual content includes vaginal, oral and anal sex, and non-penetrative intercourse, as well as nude scenes without sexual intercourse as an element.

Mature themes in the story of all versions include past trauma and dysfunctional relationship dynamics, Frequent profanity is present in the script, as well as sexually explicit dialogue. Violence is present in the script and renders, and dangerous combat is described and rendered accurately.
